DESCRIPTION.P: Scicos editor creates and uses for each block a data structure containing all information relative to the graphic interface and simulation part of the block. Each of them are stored in the Scicos editor diagram data structure. Index of these in Scicos editor diagram data structure is given by the creation order.
For Super blocks model.rpar contains a data structure similar to the scicos_diagram data structure.

ITEM.label: blk: Scilab mlist, Scicos block data structure defined by the formal
ITEM.SP: name 'Block' and containing the following fields:

ITEM.label: graphics
ITEM.SP: : Scilab mlist, graphic properties data structure

ITEM.label: model
ITEM.SP: : Scilab mlist, system properties data structure.

ITEM.label: gui
ITEM.SP: : character string, the name of the graphic user interface function (generally written in Scilab) associated with the block.
